title: Online Sins
description: Stalking, screen time, and accidental likes. Expose your digital habits.

cards.content: Never have I ever accidentally liked a photo from 3 years ago.
Never have I ever deleted a post because it didn't get enough likes.
Never have I ever used a fake account to spy on someone.
Never have I ever Googled the answer to a simple question.
Never have I ever ignored a call while staring at the screen.
Never have I ever taken more than 50 selfies to get 1 good one.
Never have I ever used ChatGPT to write an email/assignment.
Never have I ever watched an entire series in one day.
Never have I ever slid into the DMs of a celebrity.
Never have I ever lied about 'seeing' a message.
Never have I ever unfollowed someone because they posted too much.
Never have I ever bought followers or likes.
Never have I ever blocked someone and then unblocked them to check on them.
Never have I ever pretended to be busy but was just scrolling TikTok.
Never have I ever sent a risky text and immediately turned off my phone.
Never have I ever used FaceTune or Photoshop on a selfie.
Never have I ever logged into someone else's account without them knowing.
Never have I ever screen recorded a Snapchat/Story.
Never have I ever left a group chat immediately after being added.
Never have I ever turned off read receipts.
Never have I ever posted a 'thirst trap'.
Never have I ever typed 'lol' when I wasn't laughing.
Never have I ever shared a password with a partner.
Never have I ever clicked 'I Agree' without reading the Terms & Conditions.
Never have I ever diagnosed myself with a disease using WebMD.
Never have I ever watched a video on 2x speed.
Never have I ever fallen asleep with my phone in my hand.
Never have I ever dropped my phone in the toilet.
Never have I ever used someone else's Netflix account.
Never have I ever made a meme.
Never have I ever been blocked by a celebrity.
Never have I ever created a fan account.
Never have I ever argued with a stranger in the comments.
Never have I ever spent money on a mobile game.
Never have I ever cleared my browser history out of paranoia.
Never have I ever taken a phone detox and failed.
Never have I ever texted the wrong group chat.
Never have I ever pretended to have a bad connection to hang up.
Never have I ever had a screen time of over 10 hours.
Never have I ever used a VPN to watch a show.
Never have I ever subscribed to an OnlyFans.
Never have I ever sold something on Facebook Marketplace.
Never have I ever responded to a spam email.
Never have I ever had a viral tweet/video.
Never have I ever used a filter to see what I look like old.
Never have I ever used an anonymous Q&A app.
Never have I ever checked my ex's LinkedIn.
Never have I ever judged someone based on their Spotify Wrapped.
Never have I ever posted a status I regretted.
Never have I ever filmed a TikTok in public.
Never have I ever watched ASMR.
Never have I ever muted a friend's stories.
Never have I ever tagged myself in a photo where I looked good but my friend didn't.
Never have I ever used 'Find My Friends' to spy on someone.
Never have I ever broken a phone screen.
Never have I ever brought a charger to a bar.
Never have I ever texted while driving.
Never have I ever walked into a pole while texting.
Never have I ever had a secret Pinterest board.
Never have I ever edited Wikipedia.
